title: Process Management
description: List all running processes with detailed information
hint: Use 'ps' with 'aux' flags to see all processes

title: Find and Kill Process
description: Find the process ID of 'nginx' and terminate it
hint: First use ps and grep to find the process, then use kill

title: System Resource Monitoring
hint: Use the 'top' command for real-time monitoring

title: Disk Usage Analysis
description: Check disk usage of the entire filesystem in human-readable format

title: Network Connections
description: Display all network connections and listening ports

title: Archive Creation
description: Create a compressed tar archive of the /home/user/documents directory

title: System Logs
description: View the last 50 lines of the system log
hint: Use tail with -n flag to specify number of lines

title: Cron Job Scheduling
description: Edit the crontab to schedule a job
hint: Use crontab with -e flag to edit

title: User Management
description: Add a new user named 'developer' to the system

title: Service Management
description: Check the status of the SSH service

title: Advanced Grep
description: Find all lines containing 'error' in log files, case-insensitive
hint: Use grep with -i flag for case-insensitive search

title: SSH Key Generation
description: Generate a new SSH key pair
hint: Use ssh-keygen to create SSH keys
